post.title: Opensource Peer-to-Peer Projects List
post.body:
A collection of opensource peer-to-peer projects.

## Categories

* [Communication](#communication)
* [Platforms](#platforms)
* [Finance](#asymmetric-finance--human-point-of-view-)
* [Data Transfer & Streaming](#data-transfer--streaming)
* [Storage](#storage)
* [Web](#web)
* [In Progress..](#in-progress)



### Communication

[**ZeroNet**](http://zeronet.io/)
Decentralized Sites using Bitcoin crypto and BitTorrent network.

[**Twister**](http://twister.net.co/)
P2P microblogging platform.

[**BitMessage**](https://bitmessage.org/)
P2P communications protocol used to send encrypted messages.

[**Tox**](https://tox.chat/)
Secure & open-source instant messaging.

[**Ricochet**](http://ricochet.im/)
Anonymous instant messaging for real privacy

[**Ring**](https://ring.cx/)
Secure and distributed voice, video and chat communication platform 
that requires no centralized server and leaves the power of privacy in the hands of the user.

[**Freenet**](https://freenetproject.org/)
Decentralized Sites network.

[**Retroshare**](http://retroshare.sourceforge.net/)
Secure sharing software for messages, forums and chats.

[**Namecoin**](http://namecoin.org/)
Decentralized open source information registration and transfer system based on the Bitcoin cryptocurrency. 


### Platforms

[**WebRTC**](http://www.webrtc.org/)
Provide browsers and mobile applications real-time P2P communication.

[**cjdns**](https://github.com/cjdelisle/cjdns)
Implements an encrypted IPv6 network using public-key cryptography for address allocation and a distributed hash table for routing.

[**Hyperboria**](https://hyperboria.net/)
A Mesh-network.

[**TeleHash**](http://telehash.org/)
Encrypted mesh protocol.

[**GNUnet**](https://gnunet.org/)
Secure framework for peer-to-peer networking.

[**IPFS**](http://ipfs.io/)
P2P file system protocol.

[**LaZooz**](http://lazooz.org/)
A decentralized Transport app.

[**Crypti**](https://crypti.me/)
Building decentralized applications platform.


### Economy
[**Geconomicus**](https://github.com/galuel/Geconomicus	)
A co-produced universal dividend  ( Symmetric System )

[**Bitcoin**](https://bitcoin.org/en/)
(Asymmetric) Innovative payment network and a new kind of money.

[**OpenBazaar**](https://openbazaar.org/)
P2P marketplace for goods and services using Bitcoin.


### Data Transfer & Streaming

[**PeerCDN**](http://peercdn.com)
A peer-to-peer CDN, using only JavaScript!

[**Tribler**](https://www.tribler.org/howto.html)
Search and download files anonymously.

[**BitTorrent**](http://www.bittorrent.com/)
File sharing protocol.

[**GitTorrent**](https://github.com/cjb/GitTorrent)
Peer-to-peer network of Git repositories being shared over BitTorrent.

[**WebTorrent**](https://github.com/feross/webtorrent)
Streaming torrent client for node & the browser.


### Storage

[**Tahoe-lafs**](https://tahoe-lafs.org/trac/tahoe-lafs)
A Open and decentralized storage system.

[**Storj**](http://storj.io/)
Decentralized cloud storage.

[**Sync**](https://www.getsync.com/)
Fast, private file sharing for teams and individuals.

[**Syncthing**](https://syncthing.net/)
Private sync & file sharing for your files.


### In Progress..

[**uCoin**](http://ucoin.io/)
A project to implement Basic Income through crypto-currencies. To a free economy.

[**MaidSAFE**](http://maidsafe.net/)
A decentralised, end-to-end encrypted Internet.

[**Synereo**](http://www.synereo.com/)
Fully decentralized and distributed social platform.

[**OpenLibernet**](http://openlibernet.org/)
Global mesh communication network.

[**GitTorrent**](https://github.com/cjb/GitTorrent)
Network of Git repositories being shared over BitTorrent.

[**Gitchain**](https://github.com/gitchain/)
Gitchain is an application of ideas behind Bitcoin, Namecoin and DHT applied to Git hosting.


### Web

[**YaCy**](http://yacy.net/en/index.html)
P2P search engine.

post.title: Why Peer-to-peer Opensource Software Is So Important
post.body:
### [Video : Why Peer-2-Peer Opensource Software Is So Important](https://webcloud.zaclys.com/index.php/s/grAGdALulDGjTJq) ![](./img/yw5kyQi.png)
-------- #### [Zeronet.io - Sites & Forums](http://zeronet.io/) #### [Twister - microBlogging](http://twister.net.co/) #### [Bitmessage - Messaging (Email)](http://bitmessage.org/) #### [Tox.chat - Messaging](http://tox.chat/) #### [Ricochet.im - Messaging](http://ricochet.im/) #### [Ring.cx - Messaging](https://ring.cx/) #### [IPFS.io - File Sharing Protocol](http://ipfs.io/) #### [NameCoin - DNS](http://namecoin.org/) #### [Freenet - Sites](http://freenetproject.org/) #### [YaCy.net - Web Search](http://yacy.net/)
#### [List of P2P services here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JRzcmmm7X4iLsSLRDK7DT6EP2uPMnuLhP/?Post:20:New+blog+post)
------------
![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmNcjqLDv5GiF1y9fKLpA8hTGSqdWt629uVSWn2CSnvE3W)

post.title: Ğeconomicus 1.5 is out !
post.body:
Ğeconomicus is a set of free graphics and tools to play a generic economy simulation based on 80 years human life expectancy or more, with different money systems, including a freedom money system like, as it is demonstrated in Relative Money Theory (GPL v3) = a money system based on an Universal Dividend (see https://github.com/vtexier/theorie-relative-de-la-monnaie).

 Ğeconomicus 1.5 is out ! https://github.com/galuel/Geconomicus

post.title: Decentralization in progress
post.body:
![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmWaTci61HjcmfD3TDF9BwnujL9stHzZdVkEwC5ex6Lcoo)


Hyperboria ( the network / community ) _ Map : http://fc00.org/

Cjdns implements an encrypted IPv6 network using public-key cryptography for address allocation and a distributed hash table for routing. This provides near-zero-configuration networking, and prevents many of the security and scalability issues that plague existing networks.

https://github.com/cjdelisle/cjdns

![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/Qme2ueAjTM1cNQrDU3tm9ornv9cpgt8ByeX7GiBtXijwPR) * [ZeroNet](http://zeronet.io/) (Websites) ![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmdAbWPNE6EjsH8NdpEKpxTzfCaJgk3stCBZPULcYcnyRY) * [Ring.cx](https://ring.cx/)
![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmT7hiihXyPzM2En8ZgXzezQ7hpEsmJnYE7RBW18FVx7f5) * [Ricochet.im](https://ricochet.im/) * [Twister](http://twister.net.co/) (microBlogging) * [RetroShare](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/RetroShare) (chat & file sharing) * [NameCoin](https://namecoin.info) (Domain.Name.System) * [Proof of Existence](http://proofofexistence.com) (register) * [Ascribe](http://ascribe.io) (register) * [Coin market cap](http://coinmarketcap.com) (cryptocurrencies) * [YaCy](http://yacy.net) (search) * [Identifi](http://identifi.org) (Address book) * [Why P2P Software Is So Important](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T38BAGCxB_0) * [Videos of P2P services](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCSHWqosFfYJY5v2WqbTLhg/videos) ------- * [uCoin](http://ucoin.io) (exchanges & currencies) * [La'Zooz](http://lazooz.org) (transport) * [PassCard](https://passcard.info) (manager) * [DNSChain](https://github.com/okTurtles/dnschain) (Domain.Name.System) * [Freenet](https://freenetproject.org/) * [Swarm](https://swarm.fund/) (crowdFunding) * [Storj](http://storj.io/) (storage) * etc... ![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/Qmd7PouZkWKgwojAtCMGnabkcQCAHDA5c1RLeLJnJsAu7P)

Alternative Networks :

---------------------------------------------- Internet Service Providers : * [B4rn](http://b4rn.org.uk) : in U.K. * [Guifi](http://guifi.net) : in Spain * [Neutrinet](http://neutrinet.be) : in Belgium ------- ![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmW3U97mMPMHCFU5BbqQzTjqaxCuWN8ZATp9jy88zJKYeh)

Self-hosting :

---------------------------------------------- * [Yunohost](http://yunohost.org) -> 21+ & 93+ applications * [Tutos autoHébergement by Framasoft](http://framacloud.org/category/cultiver-son-jardin/) ------ * [CommunityCube](https://www.communitycube.net) ( decentralized grid - in development ) * [Bitnami](http://bitnami.com) * [ArkOS](https://arkos.io) ( in development )

Free money and economy

------------------- * **Network of Universal Basic Income crypto-currencies :** -> [uCoin.io](http://ucoin.io) -> [French community of the uCoin project](http://ucoin.fr) -> [Monnaie de test - MetaBrouzouf](http://www.metab.ucoin.io) * **Monetary Creation :** -> Création monétaire * **Définition d'une monnaie libre selon la Théorie relative de la monnaie :** -> [Théorie relative de la monnaie - 2009](http://vimeo.com/9320606) -> [Autres vidéos sur la TRM](http://creationmonetaire.info/videos) -----------
------------
![](https://lut.im/b68xVj3BVF/gHhRBeMYplUIBaYt.png)

----------------------------- **Computers mono-card :** * [Olimex](http://olimex.com) * CubieBoard * BeagleBoard * [LaBriqueInter](http://labriqueinter.net) **Computer :** * [Novena](https://www.crowdsupply.com/sutajio-kosagi/novena) ------------------

Art work

---------------------------------------------- * [MoanLisa](http://moanlisa.org/portfolio) * [This is colossal](http://www.thisiscolossal.com) * [latyrx - Flickr](https://www.flickr.com/photos/latyrx/)

LOL

---------------------------------------------- * [LeDailyBéret](http://www.ledailyberet.fr) * [Smileys - cat](https://github.com/melaniecebula/cat-ascii-faces)

Open-source & IT

----------------------------- **Computers with GNU/Linux distributions :** * [MiniFree : opensource laptops](http://minifree.org/) * [Ubuntu laptops certification](http://www.ubuntu.com/certification/desktop/) --------- **Some lists of opensource Softwares :** * [Choose a license](http://choosealicense.com) : Open Licenses * [F.O.S.S.Droid](http://fossdroid.com) : on mobile OS (Android) * http://mavielinux.com/2015/06/01/les-meilleures-distributions-ultra-legeres/
**French Blogs - IT :** * [LQDN WeTheNet blog](http://www.wethenet.eu) * [LQDN benjamin.sonntag blog](https://benjamin.sonntag.fr) * [OS Philippe Scoffoni blog](http://philippe.scoffoni.net) * [OS Genma blog](http://genma.free.fr) * [Korben blog](http://korben.info) * [Numerama - blog](http://numerama.com) -----------

Activité locale :

post.title: >_ Opensource P2P Softwares
post.body:
* [Why P2P Software Is So Important](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CyVRbQzc6sFCmQwTDiNmECj5zmKmCLx4u/videos/Why_P2P_Is_So_Important.mp4) - Video source : [N-O-D-E](http://n-o-d-e.net) * One more list : Awesome Peer-to-peer : -> https://github.com/kgryte/awesome-peer-to-peer ------------ _________________ _______________ * Decentralized & opensource instant messaging / Visio / file sharing : * [Tox.chat](http://tox.chat/) * [Tox : uTox](http://utox.org/) * My Tox address : A808BE26EDD1955E76B5B6AE30C0B436F7210E86263776E90F4AF606573F553F665A02331C10 * [Ring.cx](https://ring.cx/) * [Ricochet.im](https://ricochet.im/) * [Retroshare.rocks](https://retroshare.rocks/) * Decentralized emails : ![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmeVy4Z4s1GfxQkLUdNNKTJMLFV9G1hkfWmGwLqUGGvmin) * [BitMessage.org](https://bitmessage.org/) * My BitMessage address : BM-NC64QRX3ZJCYGxED2ZPd6JzMxc6FDGbd ![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmeMf535tFZejrpeTfcPmn5wFvX1EahGjppjeY3AyMQMrM) * Decentralized microBlogging : * [Twister](http://twister.net.co/) * My Twister profile : s_b_e
![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmUYndb1SkY49khYAg9Zn2yp9Z44cRFtqMnVAZP5qes8ce) * Protocols : * IPFS in development.. [ipfs.io](http://ipfs.io/) ( open and horizontal platform & protocol ) * Cjdns in development.. [Cjdns github](https://github.com/cjdelisle/cjdns) ( mesh networks protocol => no InternetServiceProviders ) * And more

post.title: >_ What is the Relative Theory of Money ?
post.body:
![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmbpFtTvLA72uEiqgDBNWnkaNDZptzu8cATPPSPDhNtQ7G)
* English : [First translation of the Relative Theory of Money](http://vit.free.fr/TRM/en_US/) * French : [TRM.CreationMonetaire.info](http://trm.creationmonetaire.info) Currencies based on the Relative Theory of Money : [uCoin.io](http://ucoin.io) * on ZeroNet : (en) : [link](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1C8s97X8vy5KaGpHmAbaNu5uUr1QQEsast/rtm/) (fr) : [link](1Js82VboDqPz4KX7b7Bc5CVhJGrYyVnuwQ/trm/) ------------ _____________ #### 3 Applications based on the Relative Theory of Money * A new economic game ( based on human beings) _ Ğeconomicus : https://github.com/galuel/Geconomicus * A local free and based on human-beings money : CrowdFunding of privatized money_ (fr) http://www.le-sou.org * uCoin _ network of communities : * [Youtube Channel / Videos about uCoin project in development](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcleYg38FkqwP1B5TxZe5Cw) * [(fr) Article on the project](https://moul.re/blog/index.php?article3/ucoin)

post.title: >_ Some lists of softwares
post.body:
![](https://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmVwWSSkBhdeAVb5BtgSeswSyKDpVPabLXbz7bsrMRAJ39)
* [Redecentralize](https://redecentralize.github.io/alternative-internet/) * [github.com list Awesome](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome) * [AlternativeTo.net](http://alternativeto.net/) * [PRISM-break](http://prism-break.org) * [PrivacyTools.io](http://privacytools.io) * [FSF _ Giving guide version 6](https://www.fsf.org/givingguide/v6/) To be anonymous, use it with : * [Tor-project.org](http://tor-project.org/) * or try [GetI2P.net](https://geti2p.net/) Other open projects : * [GNUnet.org](https://gnunet.org/) * [Freenetproject.org](https://freenetproject.org/) Decentralized search : * [YaCy.net](http://yacy.net/) Medias : * [TorrentTunes.ml](http://torrenttunes.ml/) * [ThePiratebay.cr](http://Thepiratebay.cr) --------- Get GNU/Linux Ubuntu O.S. on computers : * [PCLinuxFr](https://www.pclinuxfr.com/) * [PCUbuntoo.fr](http://pcubuntoo.fr) * [Entroware.com](https://www.entroware.com/store/) ------------- Centralized & opensource applications, can be self-hosted : * [Server of apps : YunoHost.org](http://yunohost.org/) * [Server of apps : arkOS.io](https://arkos.io/) * [OwnCloud](https://owncloud.org/) * [Searx.me](http://searx.me/) * [Kanboard](http://kanboard.net/) * [Etherpad](https://etherpad.net/) * [Ethercalc](https://ethercalc.org/) * [Gogs.io](http://gogs.io/) * [Gitlab.org](https://about.gitlab.com/)
